description: I'm pretty low level, and this has helped me a lot. There's obviously more to ear training than this app provides, but it has helped me isolate problem areas. I'm an older person, so improvement has been slow, but I have improved greatly over several years---regular practice. (I wish I could set it to automatically play things twice.)
summary: Great app - good for low level and high level

description: Very entertaining and with lots of options to train your ear. From single notes, to interval, chords and much more.
This piece of software is very good at helping to learn recognizing the different tones in music
Ich muss sagen, die App tut was sie soll. Die Töne sind angenehm und alle nötigen Funktionen sind vorhanden.

muy buena programa para la educación musical la idea es muy buena se podría mejorar mas y mejorar lo sonidos y que lo ejercicios se puedan modificar a gusto del usuario, es quizá el único programa en su tipo en linux.
no me haparese en la computadora
summary: no me aparese en la compu
